description: [Status: stable] [Name: non-ascii-name] [Message: {kind} name {name} contains a non-ASCII character] What it does Checks for the use of non-ASCII characters in variable names. Why is this bad? The use of non-ASCII characters in variable names can cause confusion and compatibility issues (see: PEP 672). Example Ã¡pple_count: int Use instead: apple_count: int
